divs: Sighting DetailsI have been looking to the the western sky the past few days due to hearing of a strange light in the night sky that reportedly appears just after sunset. I looked to the west and spotted a stationary orange planet like light. This was the brightest light in the sky. The sky was cloudless. I could see the stars clearly. The light faded in and out, from dim and small to bright and bigger. I called my husband to come and take a look. He saw the light too. Then he pulls out a green laser that is very powerful and he points it at the light in the sky. Then my husband blinks the laser twice. The light suddenly blinks out. We have not seen the light again this evening. We will looking out for and will report back any happenings.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Hiram
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Star-like object in sky, stationary orange tinge.
